item.description:
This group was founded by PeterP, a DC based Photographer with roots in New England (Holyoke, MA)

The leadership team was recently expanded with the inclusion of Rick Trotter, a partner in Light Works studio in Worcester. Rick and his partners at Light Works Studio will host group events schedule at their studio in Worcester.

PeterP runs several active Meetup groups in the DC area with hundreds of members. This group is actively looking for new members including other studios in New England interested in hosting and organizing events. Four studios in the DC area are co-organizers of his groups there.

Anyone interested in any field related to modeling/photography/styling/Fashion, etc. should join.
item.name: High-Fashion-and-Creative-Photography/New England
